question: Which of the following was the first Delhi sultan who tried to remove the name of the Caliph from his coins?
explanation: Muhammad bin was the first Delhi sultan to try to remove the name of the Caliph from his coins. However, when he was faced with political threats, he restored the practice. He too obtained a letter of investiture from the descendant of the Abbasid Caliph, like other sultans before him.
